column4: I'm thinking of install Ubuntu 11.10 on my Dad's laptop. Dell Inspiron 14 R (Intel Core i3 2350m, 4 GB 1333 MHz DDR3, 320 GB HDD, Dell Wireless 1702 802.11n)
Now, I've been using Ubuntu on my desktop computer since a long time. But I've heard that Ubuntu eats a lot of battery when compared to Windows.
there are tweaks to fix the battery problem.
